alert.logout: Invalid credentials, please log in again.

reset.description: With this command you can reset the database with the only remaining entity will be the admin.
reset.confirmation: Are you sure you want to reset the database?
reset.error: Error during reset. Try again later.

clear.description: With this command you can clear the database and refill with the initial data.
clear.confirmation: Are you sure you want to clear the database?
clear.error: Error during cleaning. Try again later.

delete.description: With this command you can delete any exercise.
delete.error: Error during deletion. Try again later.

email.title: Email
email.security: We'll never share your email with anyone else.

result.error: Error during login. Try again later.

reset.title: Reset password
reset.error: Error during change. Try again later.

sequence.title: Number of sequences
sequence.details: The number of how many times should the user repeat the exercise

delay.title: The delay (in seconds) between moments
delay.details: The delay (in seconds) between the moments of the exercise

video.title: The video identifier of the exercise
video.details: The 11 character long YouTube id, for instance 'dQw4w9WgXcQ'

name.title: The name of the exercise
name.details: The name of the exercise that will be resolved in the client application

details.title: The details of the exercise
details.details: The details of the exercise that will be resolved in the client application
